text:
These questions contain statements about autism.

We would like you to tell us what you think most other people believe. Please indicate how strongly you agree or disagree with the following statements
Most people believe that people with autism could snap out of it if they wanted.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: Most people believe that autism is a sign of personal weakness.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: Most people believe that autism is not a real medicall illness.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: Most people believe that people with autism are dangerous.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: Most people believe that it is best to avoid people with autism so that you don't become autistic yourself.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: Most people believe that people with autism are unpredictable.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: If they had autism, most people would not tell anyone.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: Most people would not employ someone they knew had been autistic.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree

text: Most people would not vote for a politician they knew had been autistic.
Answers: Strongly agree|Agree|Neither agree nor disagree|Disagree|Strongly disagree
